EmailTemplate.name: 06-24-21 BNK Connect Webinar Series Invitation.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Webinar: Adapting to a Digital First Structure – How consumer behaviors are changing banking technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Today’s banking environment is shifting. Consumers are demanding new levels of interaction and engagement from the companies they do business with. Ensuring that your customer experience and transformation strategies are in tune with these changing forces is important. Join our latest webinar on Tuesday 29th June at 12pm EST and learn how key behavior trends are impacting self-service banking and how can you adapt to these changes when it comes to your payments infrastructure. REGISTER NOW <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=e96db514e5285a35d9e130e05e1c9a159]]> See you there, The NCR Banking Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
